Platform Core SDK 1.6 API


See: Description

Builders 
Package Description
net.smartcosmos.builder
Base classes for creating different types of builders within the SMART COSMOS SDK.
net.smartcosmos.objects.builder
SMART COSMOS Objects entity builders (Builder Pattern) used to quickly and efficiently assemble a complete and validated entity instance.
SMART COSMOS Objects 
Package Description
net.smartcosmos.objects.model.context
Collection of SMART COSMOS Objects context modeling artifacts.
net.smartcosmos.objects.pojo.context
Collection of POJOs that represent the platform's object model.
net.smartcosmos.objects.pojo.reporting
General Reporting Classes.
Audit and Integration Event Generation 
Package Description
net.smartcosmos.model.event
Core event definitions that facilitate near real-time integration with external components authorized via OAuth 2.0, whereby the events are delivered to an INotificationEndpoint.
net.smartcosmos.model.integration
Provides integration mechanism with external systems via HTTP/S POST.
net.smartcosmos.pojo.event
Event definition primarily used for capturing user activity and for convey near real-time state modifications within a given account context to 3rd party integrators (e.g.
net.smartcosmos.pojo.integration
Integration endpoint definitions.
Utilities 
Package Description
net.smartcosmos.util
Collection of platform wide helper classes.
net.smartcosmos.util.json
JSON specific helper utilities.
net.smartcosmos.util.mapper
Collection of type-safe metadata de-/serializers that transform strongly typed values into a proprietary byte-array structure for type-safe storage and representation even across JSON.
Common Core 
Package Description
net.smartcosmos
Constant values, eg Field.
net.smartcosmos.geo
Convenience collection of GeoJSON POJOs used for serializing and deserializing to and from JSON, respectively.
net.smartcosmos.model.base
Foundational interfaces from which the entire SMART COSMOS object model is derived.
net.smartcosmos.model.context
SMART COSMOS wide account, user, role, and metadata model definitions.
net.smartcosmos.model.geo
Geospatial entity definition.
net.smartcosmos.pojo.base
Abstract objects from which the platform's object model is constructed.
net.smartcosmos.pojo.batch
Batch Transmission request, response, and receipt POJOs.
net.smartcosmos.pojo.context
Collection of SMART COSMOS wide context modeling artifacts.
net.smartcosmos.pojo.geo
Geospatial POJO.
net.smartcosmos.pojo.queue
Asynchronous Queue Request.
Extensions (EXPERIMENTAL) 
Package Description
net.smartcosmos.model.extension
EXPERIMENTAL PACKAGE - NO PRODUCTION SUPPORT Defines a plugin metaphor whereby 3rd party developers can tap into an account's contextual data in order to perform advanced computations that are not natively supported by the SMART COSMOS Objects platform.
net.smartcosmos.pojo.extension
EXPERIMENTAL PACKAGE - NO PRODUCTION SUPPORT POJOs used for defining an extension (a.k.a plugin).
Other Packages 
Package Description
net.smartcosmos.model.batch
SMART COSMOS batch processing capabilities.
net.smartcosmos.model.queue
Asynchronous Queue Request.

Profiles

Profiles provides self-service transparency into the supply chain and manufacturing metadata associated with RFID transponders, creating uniquely powerful intellectual property and technical data management opportunities.

Profiles REST Web Service Documentation

http://docs.smartcosmosprofiles.apiary.io

Objects

Objects easily stores all types of data from connected sensors, smart devices, automated workflows, optionally feeding data changes into external systems in near real-time.

Objects REST Web Service Documentation

http://docs.smartcosmosobjects.apiary.io

Flows

Flows speeds the implementation of fully automated RFID-centric and sensor-driven workflows, seamlessly integrating with disparate back-office systems to yield a higher degree of business productivity.

Flows REST Web Service Documentation

http://docs.smartcosmosflows.apiary.io
